Query.Sql: select apc.NHSNumber, apc.StartDateHospitalProviderSpell, apc.StartTimeHospitalProviderSpell, apc.ReferralToTreatmentPeriodStartDate, apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier from omop_staging.sus_APC apc where ReferralToTreatmentPeriodStartDate is not null and apc.NHSNumber is not null

Explanation.Description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.
START DATE (HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL) is the Start Date of the Hospital Provider Spell.
START TIME (HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL) is the Start Time of the Hospital Provider Spell .
The start date of a REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD .
Explanation.Origin: REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD START DATE
